data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 9072, Version Hash: f546e8dff486ff50228e2ae54d8502fbfc9ba766
data.actual_result: The call you are in is frozen, one way communication, the other end can hear you. You can rejoin the call but once you start to screenshare again you get a endless black loading screen until you restart Discord Client and it will work again.
data.expected_result: Resume the call of as normal since you didn't leave the call, or at least rejoin the call instead of restarting discord client.
data.short_description: Screenshare does not work until restart after you switch Window users.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a discord screenshare session. - CTRL + ALT + DEL - Click "Switch User" - Login to another user (Not sure if its due to me logging into another domain account) - Repeat from step 2 except log back into your normal account - See
